subject_id: S12 : The ECHO ID of the subject who contributed this samples
collection_time: 1310669017 : Time of collection for this sample
elapsed_time: 1310667 : Time elapsed between first positive test and collection
condition_code: I-infected| E-xposed | C-ontrol | Conva-L-escent | V-accine | W-eapon | M-ed | U-nexposed | H-andled
collecting_institution: Code of Institute collecting the sample
prime_institution: Code of Institute driving the study

pbmc_metadata.tubes_collected: 1 : Number of tubes that were collected; type: number
pbmc_metadata.total_blood_collected: 10 ml : Total volume of whole blood collected
pbmc_metadata.vials_available: 1 : Number of PBMC vials stored, or available; type: number
pbmc_metadata.pbmc_per_vial: Number of PBMCs per vial; type: number, string

plasma_metadata.vials_stored: 1 : Number of tubes that were collected; type: number
plasma_metadata.plasma_per_vial: Volume of plasma per vial; type: number, string

rna_metadata.tubes_collected: 1 : Number of PAXGene tubes collected; type: number
rna_metadata.num_aliquots: Number of PAXGene tube aliquots; type: number

infection_metadata.strain: If applicable, strain of infectious agent
infection_metadata.confirmatory_assay: Culture|PCR|ELISA|etc... How was this infection confirmed?
